name: The Zen Line !
description:
The Zen Line is a fun, addictive and simple arcade game that challenges your reflexes.
Playing The Zen Line is simple. Touch anywhere on the screen and drag left or right to move the ball. Avoid the brown tiles or your character will explode and the game will be over!
- Endless gameplay
- Challenging maze
- Endless twists and turns
- Awesome soundtrack
- Challenging levels
- Addictive and fun for all ages.
